thread.title: Teen involved in fatal shooting gets 30 years in prison
thread.title_full: Teen involved in fatal shooting gets 30 years in prison - The Denver Post

author: The Associated Press
title: Teen involved in fatal shooting gets 30 years in prison
text:
AURORA, Colo. (AP) — An 18-year-old who shot another teenager to death during an altercation in a Taco Bell parking lot has been sentenced to 30 years in prison.
The Aurora Sentinel reports (http://goo.gl/J6v2WZ ) Sterling Dillon Hook was sentenced Tuesday for the June 4, 2014, death of Mark Chalfant. Hook pleaded guilty in August to second-degree murder.
He was one of four teens arrested in connection with the slaying, which police say stemmed from a marijuana deal gone bad.
Three of the teens, including Hook, were arrested two weeks after the shooting and were later charged as adults. The fourth teen, a 15-year-old boy, was arrested almost a year after the shooting.
Police say the drug deal involved a small amount of marijuana.
———
Information from: The Aurora Sentinel, http://www.aurorasentinel.com/
